description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，中国共产党党员。曾任中共三明市委书记，福建省人大常委会副主任。
description.en: A politician of the People's Republic of China and a member of the Chinese Communist Party. He formerly served as the Secretary of the CPC Sanming Municipal Committee and the Vice Chairman of the Standing Committee of the Fujian Provincial People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国福建省下辖的地级市，是福建省的省会。黄贤模的出生地。
description.en: A prefecture-level city under the jurisdiction of Fujian Province, People's Republic of China, and the provincial capital of Fujian. It is the birthplace of Huang Xianmo.

description.zh-cn: 位于东亚的社会主义国家，通常简称为中国。
description.en: A socialist state in East Asia, commonly known as China.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在三明市的市级委员会，黄贤模曾在此担任书记。
description.en: The municipal committee of the Communist Party of China in Sanming, where Huang Xianmo once served as Secretary.

nodes.id: 福建省人民代表大会常务委员会

zh-cn: 福建省人民代表大会常务委员会

description.zh-cn: 福建省人民代表大会的常设机关，是福建省的地方国家权力机关。黄贤模曾在此担任副主任。
description.en: The standing committee of the Fujian Provincial People's Congress, the local state power organ of Fujian Province. Huang Xianmo once served as its Vice Chairman.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The founding and ruling party of the People's Republic of China.
Huang Xianmo is from Fuzhou, Fujian.

description.zh-cn: 黄贤模是中华人民共和国的政治人物。
description.en: Huang Xianmo is a politician of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 黄贤模曾担任中共三明市委书记。
description.en: Huang Xianmo once served as the Secretary of the CPC Sanming Municipal Committee.

relationships.target: 福建省人民代表大会常务委员会

description.zh-cn: 黄贤模曾担任福建省人大常委会副主任。
description.en: Huang Xianmo once served as the Vice Chairman of the Standing Committee of the Fujian Provincial People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 根据“中国共产党党员”分类，黄贤模是中国共产党的党员。
description.en: According to the category 'Chinese Communist Party members', Huang Xianmo is a member of the Chinese Communist Party.
